name: Sophim - Phytosqualan Natural Emollient
description: Sophim is a French specialist in natural emollients derived from olive oil. Their Phytosqualan QD Grade is a natural emollient with biomimetic properties that restores the lipid barrier. The company focuses on sustainable sourcing and natural origin ingredients, making their products ideal for organic and clean beauty formulations.
products: Phytosqualan QD Grade (Natural emollient, barrier repair)
notes: French natural emollient specialist with olive oil expertise. Phytosqualan QD Grade was introduced at In-cosmetics 2024. Natural emollient with biomimetic properties that restores the lipid barrier. COSMOS and ECOCERT certified for organic formulations.
